Mom's A Hip Educator Of A Brilliant Young Mind

Educating for a better world one child at a time using a creative approach with an emphasis on peace, justice, diversity and sustainability.

Educating a Crystal Child is the most rewarding challenge.

A Global Village

Mom's approach to homeschool empowers Daughter to cultivate her gifts and passions by engaging her in a creative, flexible educational process grounded in the principles of peace, justice, diversity, and sustainability. Mom partners with schools, groups, and individual families to provide the kind of education that prepares Daughter to be a wise and capable steward of the planet and each other.

Check Out Our Global Village

To Infinity And Beyond

We empower Daughter to pursue her future goals in a way that enables her to prepare for college and real life - while building on her strengths and talents and staying true to who she is. We nurture and protect her passion and enthusiasm for creating a better world which is inherent in her nature. This helps Daughter, and Mom and Dad, live authentic and meaningful lives, feeling confident in our collective ability to make an impact on the world around us.
